elements.text: You are grocery shopping and realize that you need something, but you can't remember what the item is. You spend a long time in the store trying to think of what's missing, and you can't seem to move on. After a while, you realize that you can return to the store another day, and everything will be...

elements.name: Forgetting Groceries_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
